node.address: Getsemani Calle del Espiritu Santo # 29-117 , Cartagena, Colombia

content.value:
Casa Carmen offers 6 spacious, pristine guest rooms, each one featuring comfortable beds with fresh linens, air conditioning, private en-suite bathroom, cable television, and free WiFi.

All guests have access to the peaceful central courtyard and the rooftop terrace with panoramic views of the city and several of its major landmarks, including the Castillo de San Felipe de Barajas, Convento La Popa, and La Torre del Reloj.

Guest Rooms:
#1: Large guest room that accomodates 4 guests in one double bed and 2 twin beds.

#2: Standard double room that accomodates 2 guests in one double bed. Features a built-in closet with ample storage space, perfect for guests planning a longer stay.

#3: Standard double room that accomodates 2 guests in one double bed


#5: Two-room suite that accomodates 4 guests in one double bed and 2 twin beds.

#6: Standard twin room that accomodates 2 guests in two twin beds.

description.description: Casa Carmen is a beautiful restored colonial-style house in the heart of the walled historic center of Cartagena, with six (6) spacious and neat rooms. It is located within walking distance of the monuments of the old town, close to multiple attractions and the city's vibrant nightlife. Each of the hotels booking has comfortable beds, air conditioning, private bathroom, cable TV and free Wi-Fi.
